channel.title: Teleported
channel.description: My learnings and thoughts on IoT, Machine Learning and Big Data, and how they come together

item.title: Bootstrapping your blog with Jekyll and Octopress
item.description:
Jekyll is a static site generator written in ruby. Octopress is a wrapper around Jekyll with nifty features to make it easy to manage your blog. I have used them for my blog teleported.in. Here I have documented the steps to initialize your blog, customize it, and write your first post.

I assume that you have Jekyll and Octopress installed. It is well documented in their respective documentation.
